testcase.classname: validating login function of adactin webpage
testcase.name: validating login with correct username and correct passwoord
testcase.system-out: Given user is on adacting page on chrome....................................passed When user enter "SuryaVijay47" and "VijaySurya@47"..........................passed And user should click on login button.......................................passed Then user should validate home page screen is visible or not................passed When user is on search page ,enter "Adelaide","Hotel Hervey","Double","5 - Five","29/03/2022","1/04/2022","3 - Three","2 - Two".passed And user clicks on search button............................................passed Then user user should validate second page screen is visible or not.........passed And user should click on radio button and click on continue button..........passed When user is on payment page ,enter "Arjun","Ram","chennai","1234567891234567","Master Card","February","2022","675".passed And user clicks book now button.............................................passed Then get oder id............................................................passed
